Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at St George Hotel in Dubai (Bur Dubai), you'll be minutes from Spice Souk and Grand Mosque. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Textile Souk and The Dubai Heritage Village.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 140 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a nightclub, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and complimentary babysitting/childcare. This hotel also features an arcade/game room, gift shops/newsstands, and shopping on site.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a nightclub, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and complimentary babysitting/childcare. This hotel also features an arcade/game room, gift shops/newsstands, and shopping on site.
Make yourself at home in one of the 140 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at St George Hotel in Dubai (Bur Dubai), you'll be minutes from Spice Souk and Grand Mosque. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Textile Souk and The Dubai Heritage Village.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Spice Souk - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Grand Mosque - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Textile Souk - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
The Dubai Heritage Village - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Dubai Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Sheikh Saeed Al Maktoum House - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Gold Souk - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Perfume Souq - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Bastakiya - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Port Rashid - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Naif Souq - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Dubai Cruise Terminal - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
BurJuman Mall - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Al Ghurair Centre - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Reef Mall - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 6.4 km / 4 mi

The preferred airport for St George Hotel is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for St George Hotel is Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.


Suppliment EID AL FITR 2019, EID AL FITR 2019 is included for the day Jun, 03 2019
Suppliment EID AL FITR 2019, EID AL FITR 2019 is included for the day Jun, 04 2019
Hotel Tariff Notes: Compulsory Tourism Dirham to be paid by guest directly to the hotel per room per night valid from 31st March 2014 Onward. Note:- Guests under who are less than 21 years of age will be allowed to check-in only if accompanied by their parents. No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge for the entire booking. No date, name and room change allowed after reservation is made. Name change of existing booking are considered as cancellation and new booking will be made subject to availability. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.
